# Aspect Ratio

<Aspect> component is a wrapper of Bootstrap 5's ratio helper. It uses ratio helper classes under the hood. Default value of ratio is 16x9. Supported values of ratio prop are:

type ratio = '1x1' | '4x3' | '16x9' | '21x9' | number
1
<Select v-model="ratio" :options="['16x9','21x9','4x3','1x1',50,100]"></Select>
<Aspect :ratio="ratio">
    <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/678344029?h=0458dff732"
            allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture"
            allowfullscreen></iframe>
</Aspect>
1

4
